OneLineDescription: WIP: Apply a ChanceNone to leveled NPC lists, reducing the number of enemies encountered.
LongDescription: An experimental/WIP patcher to reduce the number of enemies encountered by applying a 'chance none' to many leveled NPC lists. Comes with an extensive blacklist for Simonrim, creation club, and many other mods, but I strongly recommend double-checking the log to avoid breaking quests. See readme.
